name: Victoria Sterling
core_wound: Spent 40 years married to a brilliant man who treated her as an accessory
wants: To preserve her husband's legacy and her social position
needs: To acknowledge who he really was and find her own identity
voice_markers: Refers to people by full names and titles
Says 'one does not' instead of 'you don't'
contradiction: Defends her husband's reputation while secretly relieved he's dead
knowledge_state: Doesn't know about the affairs or academic sabotage

relationships.Professor_Sterling: Complicated - duty, resentment, habit, relief at his death
relationships.Detective_Reeves: Sees him as a gentleman in a crude profession
relationships.Dr_Harrington: Noticed her absence after the death, finds it odd
relationships.Thomas_Sterling: Protective of her son but knows he resented his father

background: 67 years old, Beacon Hill society matriarch, art collector, runs several charities. Married to Professor Sterling for 42 years.
